description: Deleting your account removes all hub profiles, collections and browsing data
Confirm and Continue?

description: If your user information is showing up outdated, refresh the home tab, instead.

description: You can manage collections from your account overview (5th tab).
add.title: Add Collection

description: Are you sure you want to delete this collection?
Any posts you saved under this collection will be lost.
delete.title: Confirm Deletion

description: Update your description for this collection
Submit empty string to set default

description: Rename, describe or remove this collection

description: Assign a new name for this collection.

description: See alt text for this image.
Submit empty string to remove.

description: Your "Unlisted" posts are hidden from feeds and search.
Your "Direct" messages are not encrypted.

description: Profiles help you keep your pins and hub layout organised based on interest.

description: Are you sure you want to delete this profile?
All pins and saved layout will be lost.
profileDelete.title: Confirm Deletion

description: You can rename or delete this profile.
descriptionAlt: You can only rename a default profile.

description: Assign a new name for this profile.
profileRename.title: Rename Profile

description: Tags can also be added when browsing timelines (by pressing the tag).

description: Change which hashtag this pin takes you to.

description: You can remove this pin.

description: This user currently follows you.
